metadata.Title: CVE-2023-1077 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: In the Linux kernel, pick_next_rt_entity() may return a type confusedentry, not detected by the BUG_ON condition, as the confused entry will notbe NULL, but list_head.The buggy error condition would lead to a typeconfused entry with the list head,which would then be used as a typeconfused sched_rt_entity,causing memory corruption.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
